name: Conclusive Ovation
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Lyney, equip this card.
After Lyney equips this card, immediately use Prop Arrow.
When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lyney in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1310]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1310] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13102]</color>.
When $[A1310] is on the field and has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by $[A1310] and your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113101]</color> will deal +2 DMG to characters <color=#FF9999FF>affected by {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color>. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1310] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lyney</color>, equip this card.
After Lyney equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Prop Arrow</color>.
When Lyney is on the field and has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by Lyney and your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grin-Malkin Hat</color> will deal +2 DMG to characters <color=#FF9999FF>affected by {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro</color>. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lyney in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Lyney to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
